name: Faster Then Shadows
description:
Faster Then Shadows is a game where you need to destroy all turret in a level after looking through the level with an upper view. Game will operate with ray tracing and supports DLSS.

Controls:

W, A, S, D Movement;

Left mouse button to shoot;

Space to jump;

CTRL to crouch;

B to change fire mode;

Q to enter arena;
